Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with significant delays at 54th/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with significant delays at 54th/Cermak due to earlier police activity.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #49 Western Reroute at Western/61st
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted near Western/61st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via exit the terminal onto 79th, Damen, 71st, Western, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Western/61st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary X49 Western Express Reroute at Western/61st
ShortDescription: X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Western/61st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via exit the terminal onto 79th, Damen, 71st, Western, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Western/61st.

Allow extra travel time.

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Western, Marquette, Damen, 63rd, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 63rd/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #8 Halsted Reroute near Halsted/58th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses temp. rerouted near Halsted/58th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Halsted/58th.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 59th. Emerald, 58th, Halsted, and resume normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, 57th, Emerald, 59th, Halsted, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #55 Garfield Reroute near Garfield/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted near Garfield/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Damen, 51st, Western, Garfield and resume normal route: due to, street blockage near Garfield/Hamilton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temp. rerouted NB Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr and Clark; SB Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster and Clark: near Clark/Catalpa.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Clark/Catalpa due to street blockage near Clark/Catalpa.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr and Clark including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #29 State Reroute near State/63rd
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rerouted near State/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/63rd.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 59th, Wells, Marquette, State, and resume normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Marquette, Wentworth, 59th, State, and resume normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.
